text: Hi, I'm Alex from TechCorp. To start, could you please share your full name?
What is your current role or position at your company?
Tell me about your experience with technology companies. Have you worked at startups, established companies, or both?
What leadership positions have you held, and what size teams have you managed?
What industries or sectors have you focused on throughout your career?
What functional areas do you consider your core expertise - such as sales, marketing, operations, finance, or technology?
What accomplishments are you most proud of in your professional career?
What was the most significant challenge you faced, and how did you overcome it?
What are your career aspirations for the next 3-5 years?
Thank you for sharing your background with us. We appreciate your time and will be in touch soon!
